name: PolyCities
description:
Welcome to PolyCities! In this Low-Poly City Building Game you build a huge city on a variety of planets! This is a concept demo for a larger City Management game I may work on in the future. Hope you enjoy playing!

PLANETS

Mars!

Dystopian World!

Earth!

CONTROLS

Use Space Bar and scroll-wheel to zoom in/out and use middle mouse button to rotate the camera!

Use the 1-9 keys to place a variety of buildings on your planet of choice!

Playing with the browser in Fullscreen helps add to the experience!
